    B

    Bill(String, String, String, double, boolean) - Constructor for class hms.Billing.Billing.Bill
    Constructs a new Bill instance with the specified details.
    Billing - Class in hms.Billing
    The Billing class handles all billing-related functionalities, such as adding bills, calculating bill amounts, updating billing status, and verifying the integrity of the billing blockchain.
    Billing() - Constructor for class hms.Billing.Billing
     
    Billing.Bill - Class in hms.Billing
    Represents an individual bill with details such as bill ID, patient ID, description, amount, and payment status.
    billingAdmin - Interface in hms.Billing
    Interface representing administrative billing operations in the hospital management system.
    billingPatient - Interface in hms.Billing
    Interface representing patient billing operations in the hospital management system.
    Block - Class in hms.Billing
    Represents a block in the blockchain used for billing records.
    Block(String, String) - Constructor for class hms.Billing.Block
    Constructs a new Block with the specified data and previous hash.
    Blockchain - Class in hms.Billing
    Represents a blockchain used for billing records in the hospital management system.
    Blockchain() - Constructor for class hms.Billing.Blockchain
    Constructs a new Blockchain and initializes it with a genesis block.
